p: In this review, 11 studies that used nanoencapsulated oils in the food industry were analyzed [ 10, 16, 35, 37, 38, 83– 87], and 1 figure, Fig. 3 was made that describes the technologies, nanoencapsulated oils, and wall materials used. Generally, there are many methodologies for the production of nanocapsules containing oils, such as emulsion-diffusion [ 16, 38, 85], emulsification-solvent evaporation [ 83], high-shear emulsification [ 10, 87], spontaneous emulsification [ 84, 88], homogenization [ 37], spray drying [ 35], and the emulsion supercritical fluid extraction process [ 86] (Fig. 3a). In general, the techniques are similar, with some particular similarities between each of them.
